text: Evening, quick question is it possible to record the available lay price with the runners selection id? Thanks

elements.text: Evening, quick question is it possible to record the available lay price with the runners selection id? Thanks

text:
```for runner in market_book.runners:
    print({'selection_id': runner.selection_id, 'available_to_back': runner.ex.available_to_back, 'available_to_lay': runner.ex.available_to_lay})```

elements.text:
for runner in market_book.runners:
    print({'selection_id': runner.selection_id, 'available_to_back': runner.ex.available_to_back, 'available_to_lay': runner.ex.available_to_lay})

text: (then loop through available to lay / back as needed to get the price / size)
